game.name: A game about sucking (up ghosts with a Vacuum)
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A short, active incremental game about sucking up a range of cute, mischievous Ghosts with a Vacuum and harvesting their Ectoplasm.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A short, active incremental game about sucking up a range of cute, mischievous Ghosts with a Vacuum and harvesting their Ectoplasm.
